DOC.brief_summary: This prospective randomized study compare safety efficacy two different embolizing agent treatment pelvic congestion syndrome : fibered platinum coil vascular plug .
DOC.brief_title: Fibered Platinum Coils v Vascular Plugs Pelvic Varices Embolization Treatment Pelvic Congestion Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective randomized study compare safety efficacy two embolizing agent treatment pelvic congestion syndrome : fibered platinum coil ( Nester coilsÍ¾ Cook Medical ) vascular plug ( Amplatzer vascular plug II ; St. Jude Medical ) .
DOC.criteria: Signed informed consent Presence chronic abdominal pelvic pain 6 month > 6 mm pelvic venous caliber measure transvaginal US Presence venous reflux OR presence communicate vein assess transvaginal Doppler US Diagnosed gynecological pelvic pathology : endometriosis , pelvic inflammatory disease , postoperative adhesion , adenomyosis leiomyoma Glomerular filtration rate < 60 ml/min History contrast reaction Patients able follow least one year
